lead_paragraph: The attack appears to have been staged by Houthi militias in northern Yemen in retaliation for a series of deadly airstrikes by the Saudi-led military coalition.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen, and Nour Youssef from Cairo.

headline.print_headline: Missile Fired From Yemen Kills Saudis
headline.main: Cross-Border Fire From Yemen Kills 7 in Saudi Arabia

snippet: The attack appears to have been staged by Houthi militias in northern Yemen in retaliation for a series of deadly airstrikes by the Saudi-led military coalition....
abstract: Missile apparently fired by Houthi militias in Yemen kills seven people in Najran, Saudi Arabia.
